pages.text: One thing that continually bothered me about my summoners was how frequently their Soulbooks would run dry. There had to be a way to make them last longer, right?$(p)Well, I found it. Turns out, that shiny blue metal, $(item)Niobium$(), seems to take away some of the essence draw from the Soulbook.

I've found the most efficient configuration is to create a niobium gear encasing bone. The gears position themselves within the summoner like oscillating gears. Each reduces the draw from the Soulbook slightly.
